info: A basic calculator application built with React using NextJS and Typescript.
A to-do list application built with React, NextJS, and Typescript.
BrewerySearchApp is a simple interface to search and filter a database of US breweries. Data provided by openbrewerydb.
This simple weather app, built with NextJS & Typescript, allows users to search by city name and recieve a quick 3 day forecast. Data is pulled from the openweathermap API.
